column5: Hey ive noticed a few people with OFC hats or a bumpersticker and was wondering where a person could get these ? Also when posting pictures how would i put the boards web addy on the bottom right ?    thanks .

http://ofnstore.com  I'm not sure if there's an automated way to watermark photos using the site software.  I'd just type on them using whatever image software you have installed before uploading them.
If you load your pictures to the OFC gallery.. it puts the web address on them!
So THAT's how it works.  Thanks!
Ive got some stuff coming in.. some fillet knives and pocket knives, hats boat towels... etc... are in.
Looking forward to the sharp utensil additions  G
Hmmm....is adding weapons to the store a good idea?? LOL
